definitions.definition: The relatively low-pitched instrumental part of a piece of popular music .

A music genre, closely related to UK garage , that originated in South Yorkshire and the West Midlands in the early 2000s, having a four-on-the-floor rhythm and a strong emphasis on bass , with chopped-up vocal samples and a pop music aesthetic.

main_definition: ( music , countable ) The relatively low-pitched instrumental part of a piece of popular music .
secondary_definitions: ( music , uncountable ) A music genre, closely related to UK garage , that originated in South Yorkshire and the West Midlands in the early 2000s, having a four-on-the-floor rhythm and a strong emphasis on bass , with chopped-up vocal samples and a pop music aesthetic.
